name: Storm Bird
description:
Talk your way through this rough time

Storm Bird is a game about the struggle of one college student trying to find himself. In this textbased game you will have to make choices to see how the life of Steven will turn out. But how will it end?

We made this!

Storm Bird is a student project made in 1 week at Futuregames Higher Vocational Educations in Stockholm, Sweden. The team included Mattias "Mau" Lundell,  Alex Bergendorff R. and William Dahlberg. This game was made June 2020 in Twine.

Warning: This game talks about drug abuse and depression.
